CustomField.description: Defines if a ABA Payment File will include a balancing line. Your financial institution will specify if a balancing line is required. This value is pulled from the related Payment Details record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if a ABA Payment File will include a balancing line. Your financial institution will specify if a balancing line is required. This value is pulled from the related Payment Details record.
CustomField.label: ABA File Include Balancing Line
